attributes.action: Update the system of CAMHS so that it is more inclusive for youths.
attributes.additional_details: CAMHS overall does not help many people because it tries to put people in one box and the waiting list for an inperson meeting is extremely long.
attributes.background: Improve the methods used by CAMHS so that it can help more young people from different backgrounds.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about how Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services work, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services (CAMHS): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631684

Increase funding for all mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634345
